data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: I would like to talk about an important historical event. It was in the year 1564 when William Shakespeare was born. Over 1,000 words in the English language are used today because of William Shakespeare, and phrases from his plays are still commonly used in daily conversation. It is not just his language that was important, he was the great entertainer of his day, writing in a time when the theatre was popular entertainment for all people. Elizabeth I have been the queen for much of his life, but it was Shakespeare who wrote much of the history.
data.referenceText: Describe an important historical event. What, where and how did it happen? What effect do you think this event had?
data.referenceTranslate: 请描述一个重要的历史事件，它是在哪里发生的，又是如何发生的?
